mapper.insert: INSERT IGNORE INTO news_tb (type, title, time, fixed_recommend, is_recommend, img_address, content, unit_price, total_price, reading_number, now_total_price, status, manager_id) VALUES (#{type}, #{title}, #{time}, #{fixedRecommend}, #{isRecommend}, #{imgAddress}, #{content}, #{unitPrice}, #{totalPrice}, #{readingNumber}, #{nowTotalPrice}, #{status}, #{managerId})
mapper.update: UPDATE news_tb SET news_id=#{newsId}, type=#{type}, title=#{title}, time=#{time}, fixed_recommend=#{fixedRecommend}, is_recommend=#{isRecommend}, img_address=#{imgAddress}, content=#{content}, unit_price=#{unitPrice}, total_price=#{totalPrice}, reading_number=#{readingNumber}, now_total_price=#{nowTotalPrice}, status=#{status}, manager_id=#{managerId} WHERE news_id=#{newsId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM news_tb where news_id in (select news_id from (select max(news_id) as news_id,count(title) as count from news_tb group by title having count >1 order by count desc) as tab )
mapper.select: SELECT news_id, type, title, time, fixed_recommend, is_recommend, img_address, content, unit_price, total_price, reading_number, now_total_price, status, manager_id FROM news_tb WHERE news_id=#{newsId}

SELECT news_id, type, title, time, fixed_recommend, is_recommend, img_address,
unit_price, total_price, reading_number, now_total_price, status, manager_id FROM news_tb AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(news_id) FROM news_tb )-(SELECT MIN(news_id) FROM news_tb ))+(SELECT MIN(news_id) FROM news_tb)) AS id) AS t2 WHERE t1.news_id >= t2.id AND is_recommend=${isRecommend} ORDER BY rand() LIMIT #{pageSize};
